summary: This mod allows to map "Sit Anywhere" mod spells to the menu of Easy Wheelmenu.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Objective of this mod :[/b][/u]

To use "Sit Anywhere" actions you have to use a power spell. With this mod, you can sit anywhere or create a sitting spot throught the menu interface provided my Easy Wheelmenu mod. No more need to switch off your precious Zun Haal Viik if want to sit & relax after putting to a defintive rest a bunch of Draugrs.

[u][b]Requirement :[/b][/u]
This mod needs :
- [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23179]Sit Anywhere[/url]
- [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69878]Easy Wheelmenu[/url]

No particular load order is needed.

[u][b]Acknowledgments :[/b][/u]

[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/6240905]Kesta[/url] for the mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69878]Easy Wheelmenu[/url]

[/list]
author: ZoboZeWarrior
